content.raw:
when doing the check to create the screw joint:

`if (posErrInsert > 0.0 && posErrCenter < 0.003 &&  rotErr < 0.05 && valveAng > -0.1)` 

it seems like the condition checks on `posErrInsert` and `rotErr` can not be satisfied unless the coupling is well aligned with the standpipe. So inserting at an angle is still going to be difficult. If that's the intended behavior then the pull request looks good.
